faqs.question: Which MOBA is easier for beginners?
faqs.answer: Mobile Legends is more beginner-friendly with simple controls and fast matches.

faqs.question: Which game has better graphics?
faqs.answer: Arena of Valor has more realistic hero designs and cinematic skill effects.

faqs.question: Can I play both games on low-end devices?
faqs.answer: Mobile Legends runs smoother on mid-to-low-end devices, while Arena of Valor may need higher specs.

faqs.question: Which game is better for competitive play?
faqs.answer: Arena of Valor offers deeper strategic gameplay and a strong esports ecosystem.
